q: Your ex texts 'U up?' What's the healthiest response?
B: Reply: Only if you bring pizza

q: You pocket-dial your boss. What do you do?
D: Hang up and send a short apology text

q: Group chat has 200 unread messages. Best move?
A: Mark all as read, never look
D: Skim and respond only where you're needed

q: You posted with a typo. Fix?
You're late to a call. Proper etiquette?
C: Notify ASAP and give a new ETA
